name: Titanium.Android.ActionBar
summary: An action bar is a window feature that identifies the application and user location, and provides user actions and navigation modes.

methods.name: hide
methods.summary: Hides the action bar if it is currently showing.
methods.description: See also: hide in the Android API Reference.

methods.name: setDisplayShowHomeEnabled
methods.summary: Shows or hides the action bar home icon
methods.description: See also: setDisplayShowHomeEnabled in the Android API Reference.

parameters.name: show
parameters.summary: Boolean to show or hide action bar home icon

methods.name: setDisplayShowTitleEnabled
methods.summary: Shows or hides the action bar title/subtitle
methods.description: See also: setDisplayShowTitleEnabled in the Android API Reference.

parameters.name: show
parameters.summary: Boolean to show or hide action bar title/subtitle

methods.name: show
methods.summary: Shows the action bar if it is currently hidden.
methods.description: See also: show in the Android API Reference.

properties.name: backgroundImage
properties.summary: The background image for the action bar, specified as a local file path or URL.

properties.name: customView
properties.summary: Sets a view to be used for a custom navigation mode.
properties.description: Inserts a custom view for navigation in the space between the application's home button and menu actions. The custom view is trimmed to fit the space available.

properties.name: displayHomeAsUp
properties.summary: Displays an "up" affordance on the "home" area of the action bar.
properties.description: See also: setDisplayHomeAsUpEnabled in the Android Developer Reference.

properties.name: homeButtonEnabled
properties.summary: Enable or disable the "home" button in the corner of the action bar.
properties.description: See also: setHomeButtonEnabled in the Android Developer Reference.

properties.name: icon
properties.summary: Sets the application icon displayed in the "home" area of the action bar, specified as a local file path or URL.
properties.description:
Starting with Release 4.0, the action bar icon may not display. Google is discouraging the use of icons in toolbars.

Prior to Release 3.3.0, this method only works on devices with Android 4.0 (API 14) and above. See also: setIcon in the Android Developer Reference.

properties.name: logo
properties.summary: Sets the application logo displayed in the "home" area of the action bar, specified as a local file path or URL.
properties.description: Prior to Release 3.3.0, this method only works on devices with Android 4.0 (API 14) and above. See also: setLogo in the Android Developer Reference.

properties.name: navigationMode
properties.description: The navigation mode can be NAVIGATION_MODE_STANDARD, or NAVIGATION_MODE_TABS. A TabGroup is initialized by Titanium Mobile with NAVIGATION_MODE_TABS, and can be hidden by setting to NAVIGATION_MODE_STANDARD. NAVIGATION_MODE_LIST is not yet supported. See also: setNavigationMode in the Android Developer Reference.

properties.name: onHomeIconItemSelected
properties.summary: Callback function called when the home icon is clicked.

properties.name: subtitle
properties.summary: Sets the subtitle of the action bar.

properties.name: title
properties.summary: Sets the title of the action bar.
